name: Creepy Pumpkin Game
description:
This is game submitted to the Great Autumn Jam: 2021 and I was basically trying to create Over the garden wall vibes mixed with a bit of Darkwood.

I was trying to copy Limbo in terms of gameplay but didn't get around to creating any death mechanics or many scenes so thats why its really short!

I DID get around to creating my own art which I was pretty happy with though the animations are a bit wonky and the code was all mine except for the grass and leaf shaders which I got from code monkey
